<div class="bbWrapper">Jumpchain by Genre list. Think I'll need a second for media, if that's okay? Please threadmark.<br>
<br>


<div class="bbCodeSpoiler">
	<button type="button" class="bbCodeSpoiler-button button--longText button" data-xf-click="toggle" data-xf-init="tooltip" data-original-title="Click to reveal or hide spoiler" id="js-XFUniqueId280"><span class="button-text">

		<span>Spoiler: <span class="bbCodeSpoiler-button-title">Slice of Life</span></span>
	</span></button>
	<div class="bbCodeSpoiler-content" style="">
		<div class="bbCodeBlock bbCodeBlock--spoiler">
			<div class="bbCodeBlock-content">Similar to the real world (in most cases) not a lot of conflict. Just people going about their lives and daily challenges. Maybe romance, maybe sports, etc. Sit-coms and dramas.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1BISBiDVWL6FtvdAVc3uv5DxEHH4bbCQp/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">3 Minute Cup Noodle Gauntlet</a> Can you survive the 15 minute lunch break?<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1kgHOUY45qnDTf5rGmiLCkmIuZYXi_7jF/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Ah! My Goddess</a> Keiichi is offered a wish by the goddess Belldandy to make up for his miserable luck and garbage life. He wishes to see her all the time, and so she's stuck with him (and it was kinda a proposal, though it takes forever for that to catch on).<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/12xuab0hyBGAmtkG-JTs4HprlAR5Q2dsK/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Animal Crossing</a>- Cozy game about living with friendly animal neighbors in a quiet town.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1HjKq8jlyhFdgf3PNiHeAslGND7iW8Poo/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">ARIA</a>- Girls train to become gondoliers on a utopian, terraformed Mars (now called Aqua).<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1BJog8QyhKX6SoUyLbEFBzJR88r6Sfkgt/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Bofuri</a>- An MMORPG player goes for a pure defense build, and her unorthodox build is surprisingly effective and OP.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1aOHlDXLek87V4UBhfiMcxGeVhsGWUvFt/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">The Disastrous Life of Saiki K.</a>- Stars a boy who wants to live an ordinary life despite his OP psychic powers.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1O7xP4i9gRq23el9DA2J20RrIQEinZcE7/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">El Goonish Shive</a> A story about friends, and magic and aliens, and turning into women. But mostly friendship.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1igXwIEuoleAQeEZNiAwGoMO-PvBS1WGm/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Family Matters</a> a sitcom about a working class Black family, increasingly about the antics of their neighbor Urkel.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1WELukOUhRdFH2U1aQv6UnVmdeLq7RGJR/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Flintstones/Jetsons</a> sitcoms in the distant past and far future, that are still somehow basically the 1950s.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1CfHLvcLAG6UwgiHX8Bkd1I2Dv3yomgHq/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Generic Childhood Cauntlet</a> be a kid again.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1oQt4OuHhnb8QVfnv2OtSqhP1LKsd3Gnb" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Generic Cubicle</a> office job. Supplements most anywhere though.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1JUWUJ_Iueu4rjVEqwi1ebBUEluBKY-lj/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Generic Factory</a> manufacturing job.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Hq5yjtLgSFwv6zpUJUdlc_R7mhDVUghk/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Generic School Years</a> back to school, whether that means elementary, secondary, college...<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1wemBLYYRi8KAgsqGhhgj0jV-u6FuUnrP/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Generic Spacebattles</a> online forum.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/17BTzOZFB81qz1fnPZ3WPcnWIloVE1Wnz/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Girls Und Panzer</a> Tank battles (where no one dies) is the most popular girls' sport, for some reason schools are all in towns on giant aircraft carriers. But mostly this is about friends bonding over sport. Tank sport.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1N8XZqqBhoJLE0x2O3A_vqzE-soIfReyd/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Glee</a> A deranged man obsessed with his glory days throws together a school chorus with bribery, blackmail and threats, but i<i>s slightly </i>less awful than the cheer coach who is offended by the glee club's very existence.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1DYew69yiLKALO012qndgfvs72rWhA6tT/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Golden Sky Stories</a> A cutesy RPG where you play as helpful animal spirits in feudal Japan, assisting the villagers with their crafts and love lives and daily problems.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1GP_297jgWJuub55SC0as-qBAnutaz4jG/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Gonzo Journalism</a> Hunter S. Thompson Jump, be a journalist in the 1960s.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1bNL0HouWxMqJFa2wuqMJJFn2SC8aRZhW/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">The Good Place</a> three terrible people and one indecisive cinnamon roll meet in the afterlife and study moral philosophy together in and around various sitcom hijinks.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1OHvDwHKcwyomICAzRYvvlHEk7453O_TD/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Hamtaro</a>- Little hamsters go on big adventures.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1mi0X9JaMF2NhVgT0c-wL6UgEK2OOBwVl/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">How Heavy Are the Dumbbells You Lift?</a> A girl starts going to gym, makes friends, goes to some competitions and generally makes everything in her life a little better with exercise and mutual support.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1tQ4vx7D1LVWAglh-C-uiebS-Ymruvg4U/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">How to be a Werewolf</a> For years Malaya has lived a life of anxiety and tight control, terrified of hurting anyone come the full moon, until she meets another werewolf for the first time.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1dd4cKIay-7ayNb4dpLzc1kap4WoY0DcD/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">I've Been Killing Slimes For 300 Years</a> An isekai where the person sent to another world worked themselves to death and vowed to take it easy. After 300 years of hanging around a village doing chores and killing slimes, she's hit the level cap and when this is revealed challengers crawl out the woodwork. Defeat, friendship, domesticity, repeat.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1cNxBNbQcrd-2Bw-646rgqkRL7rXacGdi/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">K-On!</a>- High school girls start a band to play music and have fun (not necessarily in that order).<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1_kd-eCx0tDTNN48v-YfxK9ku3LYhgZrn/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Knights of the Dinner Table</a>- The misadventures of tabletop gamers, both in-game and out-of-game.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1WdGZ2AxNUOAbujT3TLsuK_gycvsQi43C/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Lilo &amp; Stitch</a> A little Hawaiian girl adopts as her pet an alien science experiment. Hilarity ensues.<br>
<a href="https://imgur.com/a/8Wa0z" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Mad Men</a> Work in an advertising firm in the 1960s.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1BjBft0chjXq_hm_5TwL0PLluBPJDBzeP/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Magical Pok√©mon Journey</a>- Shojo comedy about humans and Pokemon enjoying peaceful albeit silly lives in the countryside.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1eB2pScdj8DtP45KTZBUovkfaKOJH1UAf/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Meddlesome Kitsune Senko</a>- A kitsune comforts a stressed, overworked salaryman.<br>
<b>Monster Musume</b>- No link because QQ jump. Harem comedy with monster girls adapting to modern life.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1kEZLzEspOqToOiA383rQnzxKPt4WrEif/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Nichijou</a>- A perfectly ordinary high school, if you ignore things like a wind-up robot girl and a boy riding a goat to class.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1CI0xZrm8spqzBxFz1RWxhji_jeuR6QC1/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Nine to Five</a> Work a blue-collar job.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ncwwjEujVr4BpjUQyx63kKQyyFA31M1N/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Otoyomegatari (Bride Stories)</a>- Focuses on the day-to-day lives of people on the steppes of Central Asia in the 19th century.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1-lUGNTzl7cwrToJijqTvJNBjAFo42uU6/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Real Genius</a> A prodigy has trouble fitting in at his elite engineering college, but nevermind that! His teacher is going to try and weaponize his laser project!<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1RaAX85yJFnkeGqumn4IoxxVd6V2Jus1W/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Richie Rich</a> the world's richest ten-year-old just wants some friends.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1eYV0cw7KOa-LyjMPKugVqtppkDgMXRQO/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Restaurant to Another World</a> restaurant with a huge clientele.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1BAAKJX2fK-9LZlh5zesNFbxBkpkL8D0_/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Saint Young Men</a> Jesus and the Buddha take a vacation and rent an apartment in Tokyo together.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/10RbZcAKNiMgx7OiUAWrGk2F5uYIkZEyL/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Sesame Street</a> Humans and monsters all living together in harmony, learning about the alphabet and how to behave in a hospital together.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1s1rmTOsA2g1DDxmnP7TP6ShKsiB1Z8GI/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Sitcoms</a> Any sitcom, from the Cosby Show to the Fresh Prince to Friends.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1EkWfAC-ihGi_pGs6TCY21XVCJmQwddpw/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Shark Girl</a>- The mostly slice-of-life antics of a shark girl.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/17bErXsNSzdIZ0T_xVxPWmdCMSxMgRQ18/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Slice of Life</a> A generic (and poorly written).<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1qMFBsoxZMkUHvDWb-_TNn773Tr64yGVj/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Spongebob Squarepants</a> underseas sitcom.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1XKYAm6vrIahuZsI1xnA83ANy1QWaTkIu/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Spy x Family</a> In the Cold War with names fudged, elite spy Twilight must schmooze up to an important official through his sons' elite private academy, and must build a cover including a wife (an assassin) and a child (who reads minds).<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1x9d9knFG040Eh3XRz0cApsHs5nY95zcM/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Tenchi Muyo!</a>- A harem comedy with space princesses, pirates, police officers, and more. The jump offers two separate modes, each having its own twists on the purchases, and one of the modes is slice-of-life.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1hGfVqHR5Zec8t5AgzSMKfU0Q1kuEuFFm/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Total Drama</a> cartoon Survivor - except with a teenaged cast, sadistic host, and the odd supernatural shakeup every now and then.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1CRx6Qprm1G2MoJuSffxl7pCfl-hEgGB_/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Touhou Forbidden Hermit</a>- Based on three Touhou Project manga series: Forbidden Scrollery, Wild and Horned Hermit, and the various Sangetsusei "Three Fairies" installments (Eastern and Little Nature Deity, Strange and Bright Nature Deity, etc.). All of them have a good amount of slice-of-life content (arguably 80% of WHH is SoL), but Sangetsusei in particular is pure SoL, as several mischievous fairies have fun exploring Gensokyo and playing pranks.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1dvUJsGikQvcE11iLvpQri4-bkCMM8_-T/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Wee Sing</a>- A series of educational, song-filled videos for children.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1N_xhCK-W_gSmayrqqDbGwhGqBVseiBVv/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">What We Do In the Shadows</a> A sitcom/mockumentary about a collection of vampire roommates, who are mostly weirdos with trouble adapting to the modern world.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1h0Sk40IOVTV2eOV8dnaKaz2PIvdBIAm3/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Winnie the Pooh</a> Cutesy animals frolic in the Hundred Acre Wood.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1IWhUWQEXE9tpilokQ9tkn__6eY6SzFgV/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Wii Sports Resort</a> Life on a tropical island full of sports nuts.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1KOqnlPntSSAFL3AXoGaYfAaLch1bgkOB/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Youtube</a> Be a content creator in 2007-17 Youtube, the golden age of the site. You need a million subscribers!</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</div><br>


<div class="bbCodeSpoiler">
	<button type="button" class="bbCodeSpoiler-button button--longText button" data-xf-click="toggle" data-xf-init="tooltip" data-original-title="Click to reveal or hide spoiler" id="js-XFUniqueId281"><span class="button-text">

		<span>Spoiler: <span class="bbCodeSpoiler-button-title">History/Alt-History/Lost World</span></span>
	</span></button>
	<div class="bbCodeSpoiler-content">
		<div class="bbCodeBlock bbCodeBlock--spoiler">
			<div class="bbCodeBlock-content">How it was - allowing for some bias and maybe not in every respect. Or how it could have been. Or lost lands untouched by men for exploration and - mostly Dinotopia. Yeah, the 'lost world' category is mostly there to provide a home for Dinotopia.<br>
<br>
<u>Generics:</u><br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/12RTa2nOuHBays6S6648IoGSebSHfXsSl/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Generic Dinosaur Gauntlet</a> When dinosaurs ruled the Earth.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Nsa2z-uJm6udWVDnRaqxW-MNiCJQh6N9/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Generic Alternative History</a> Catch-all for alternate history stories.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1M2Dj_WKx4sEjLej9Upn1P52eKzPl5vV1/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Age of Sail</a> for fans of Treasure Island, or Horatio Hornblower, Aubrey-Maturin or heaven help you Herman Melville, spend some years on a sailing ship, anywhere from the Bronze Age to the 19th Century.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1cVF6ZmKBMVzmYlQBhZHpgp-SdSnUTgih/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Generic Pirate</a> From the Golden Age of Piracy, to the Bronze Age, to space piracy.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1hsgyOquO6Oy5mNADxbx3xS-zAfVS11F1/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Generic Australia</a> A godforsaken land which, despite being across the world, still has a South Wales.<br>
<br>
<u>History/Historical Fiction:</u><br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1dxPZe9nMXAAy8XZsDmYnfWgUo4LB4tne/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Prehistory</a> Upper Paleolithic to Neolithic. Before Humanity built cities or wrote things down.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1aI4CcNIoJ3BlmKLLAZUna4QJU35Vywm9/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Bronze Age Collapse</a> We still don't know what caused the roughly 1200 BC near-total disintegration of civilization in the Mediterranean/Middle East. Was it plague? Famine? Raising "Sea Peoples?" Care to find out?<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1HJiFv_cO0pD6I26Om_zbKT49HCFtbkBF/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Historic Rome</a> Pick a period in Roman history. Kingdom, Republic, Empire, even unto the Eastern Empire.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1yLw9-Fl5pt8j8ZMAbY1X_dODduzYJTkr/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Imperator Rome</a> Be a ruler from 302-38 BCE, probably in Rome.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1GGUde0Lbw6s9wQCLH4yB8EUjETA32m0o/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Spartan: Total Warrior</a> Be a footsoldier in the Pyrrhic War (Roman conquest of Greece, 280-275 BCE). In a videogame where the protagonist eventually drives the Romans off which is, ah, not how things went down, historically.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1LWd5Km8U2KWvseA1G4Lt6y5l3O4dvdu6/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Rome</a> HBO drama, largely from the POV of two common soldiers, following the meteoric rise and fall of Gaius Julius Caeser and his nephew Octavion/Augustus.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ANsZrVHLkQtSpiLGt24InLrAGjPZ6HfR/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Generic Middle Ages</a> the thousand years or so between the fall of the (Western) Roman Empire and the Renaissance in Europe.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1dqQlDI4ud44wy17LebAa1VFXE4x5gsZh/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Silence</a> in 1640s Japan, the Shogun forbids the foreign Christian religion. This is a dramatization of the martyrdom of the last open Christians in Japan.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Bn_EGIHzHH7CFEVzeEoiSo7y7o3BqUAC/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Hamilton</a> Musical about the American Revolution, and the twenty years that followed, from the perspective of Alexander Hamilton, a period politician famous for his financial wizardry, and getting shot and killed in the duel that mostly killed dueling culture in the US.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1-wbvdLXISX7XVNuhVJ6yC7GytZrz6fEq/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">French Revolution</a> 1790s overthrow of the French Monarchy.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1SKc2dnnAr09rlpUch6DIydgNV3tJnKKt/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Jack of All Trades</a> America's best spy, a scoundrel with a heart of gold and derring-do is dispatched to a remote tropical island where he is to collaborate with a British agent, a woman and technological genius, to thwart various French plots &amp; repeatedly humiliate Napoleon. Very hammy, tongue-in-cheek swashbuckling kind of show.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1XmeSm_BwjbqlqYvyfLXY6HuY5RgUQZ2h/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">The Count of Monte Cristo</a> Edmond Dantes is framed (well, sorta) for treason and sent to prison, comes back years later having learned of a great fortune &amp; dedicating himself to revenge.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1rmN_Z5sudMFW0LYZBfyLmQCZzTtCb3xt/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Zorro</a> A masked bandit fights for the common man in a California undergoing many transitions in government.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/10kLq248wfA0StSqMh4s8eU8CzAv2hjuS/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">American Civil War</a> war between North &amp; South USA after the South rebels in fear of losing their slaves.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1HkrZML8gQp-1_XB7l4OsNrPK3leu2574/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Generic Western</a> Stories set in the Wild West, when prospectors and settlers more or less outran law enforcement for a time.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ncwwjEujVr4BpjUQyx63kKQyyFA31M1N/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Otoyomegatari (Bride Stories)</a> daily life of Asian steppes peoples in the 19th Century.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://docs.google.com/document/d/1fmgenqRgRuF_sxAH1WyRxsU7_aGUtw0XYluGB7jkYHo/edit" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Generic Victorian</a>. England between 1837-1901, the Industrial Revolution and more Imperialism than you can shake a stick at.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/18vALFsUwCom7nZm63gskrRhi_k5ZMRFk/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">World War One</a> The Great War, between the Central Powers and the Entente after a Serbian student empties a revolver into an Austrian Prince &amp; his wife.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1uazOxDpouAmPA-Jph1FvOCeU4v7KMKII/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">MASH</a> Mobile Army Surgical Hospital. Military doctors get up to wacky antics in the Korean War (1950-53).<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1yzP5y214IFv8QEQftWMG_FBlTuT9DYXp/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Space Race</a> 1957-75 period where the USA &amp; USSR competed to explore space for national pride and missile technology.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ozpngjrs5Eskh8uPWV0OCaiL8kmV4Apq/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Modern Geopolitics</a> 2002-2020, perhaps beyond.<br>
<br>
<u>Alt-History:</u><br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1ZR8_t6cyduSzoWGkaYprtOh_zrpNevrG" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Lost Eden</a> Dinosaur people doing their thing in prehistory.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1I4qF5hU3khMFEdNoyys1Aqcy5NRPK-JG/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Assassin's Creed</a> History from the Crusades on (or, I guess the <a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1B5mnZM8vTBsWOvEEg9pc0AAL06T-IYaQ/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Peloponnese Wars</a> now) but with a shadow war between freedom-loving Assassins and the order and wealth focused Knights Templar for mind-controlling trinkets of the lost First Civilization. <a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1h-GLuvcJiiLnGFHdOZCfgiZTz1hZP_aL/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Animus Gauntlet</a> for all the games, <a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/14DYwQ10VPD89eKNlX_Ja2bweguUlcw-i/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Black Flag</a> for the Golden Age of Piracy.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1YMWSpPNpk7yeSGlOijvkNH8vXZM7k0oX/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">A Declaration of the Rights of Magicians</a> French Revolution with magic. Me. Robespierre is drawn with Toussaint L.Overture and William Pitt into investigating the shadow forces pushing for war.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1i2dZAc2YxEjAcoijK4SZOYSLIJ5gVvSI/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Temeraire</a> Napoleonic Wars plus dragon riders. Fire-breathers are pretty rare, but dragons tend to be great at recon and destroying ships. Laurence is present at the hatching and bonds with an Imperial Chinese Dragon captured from a French ship, the titular Temeraire, and is continually shocked at how lax and progressive the Aerial Corps is.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1RRSi7nBmA7K7yU-Xupp5tyrr7U0rxTtH/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Dominion of Draka</a> In which Loyalist ex-pats of the American Revolution colonize Africa and create a hyper-militant slave state that out-Nazis the Nazis, are always 30 years ahead of the tech curve, somehow takes over all Africa and the Middle East by WWII, yet history proceeds on rails to that point and nobody considers them a threat. Then WWII, and a Cold War, and then a boot stamping on a human face forever.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/19YEWt8FWwDOPumhia_DP0GieSGMf_oS3/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Ring of Fire</a> A West Virginia coal-mining town in 2000 AD swaps places with a nameless German village in 1631. Also contains scenarios for related series Timespike (modern prison and Native American tribes in the Cretaceous) and Odyssey (cruise liner goes back to the Diadochi- the civil war following the death of Alexander the Great) and a toggle to take for any other ISOT story.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ssGG3GPX6twZGKdZHdZf2pS2clYoqZ3h/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Legion of Liberty</a> American Revolution, but with superheroes on both sides. Specifically, roughly one in ten thousand or so people born in the new world get superpowers which manifest in adolescence.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1USHLQTbcvYgX8FY5uThtt1uYmIUyhwxB/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Jonathan Strange &amp; Mr. Norrell</a> during the Napoleonic Wars, two gentlemen attempt to revive the English magical tradition.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/11kwKSf2nYUpHTTbYrkEMww3dGuFCQizv/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Dread Nation</a> American Wild West, but with zombies.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1GCzgFcYq-ksu0JbR5mvHpaK_XLLBD9aT/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Kaiserreich</a> Central Powers victory in the Weltkrieg (World War 1) Russia is White, but splintered. Socialist revolutions in England and France, the monarchy of the former fled to Canada. US struggling under a tide of<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1QCzqn_syog03m-LutLchdGJlXLl9G4Lf/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Uber</a> Last days of WWII go wildly off the rails as a Nazi general unveils a super-soldier program that lets the Nazis push the Soviets out, flatten London, burn most of Europe for defying them and launch a devastating attack on the US. Allies struggle to catch-up in this new form of warfare, while Stalin is killed and it looks like Russia is going super-supremacist.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://docs.google.com/document/d/1MAP0114LzI0AHCozN014NmNyIaYAV9mBOCawvnY610g/edit" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Crimson Skies</a> RPG turned video game. Air pirates in an alternate 1930s where the US Balkanized into sixteen different successor states after World War One, driven largely by regional differences on Prohibition.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1mWZB4Tovm4Hzo-3FlBSxf6MUSEYEXy8Y/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">The Man in the High Castle</a> alternate 1960s in a world where the Axis Powers won WWII, US is divided into zones under Nazi and Imperial Japanese occupation, respectively. Footage from our world is being distributed by the resistance.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Q51j_PBHLZE9i8LWNgCAQTaEdGXpyjdN/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Hanachirasu</a> Tale of assassins and vengeance in a 21st century isolationist and hardcore tradionalist Japan that never surrendered in WWII... for reasons far too convoluted and baffling to get into here.<br>
<br>
<u>Lost World: </u><br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1v4ZKd3xgfibor3YTe5ZyVaaO3EFavtqo/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Land of the Lost</a> A family is trapped in an underground realm with dinosaurs and lizard-men and stranger things.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1IERf_wROMM_t0cI_R0pFj2XmwImH3qm0/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Lost Valley of the Dinosaurs</a> Raid a lost jungle temple, get out before the lava or a T-rex gets you!<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Rz69kHcFj8e0O4cVMBsaIBqGPmC9hj51/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Dinotopia</a> <a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/15sVmQ1F68WtonW9j9dO06cTPke1cKDCX/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">TG Version</a> Two brothers are shipwrecked and wash ashore on an island where dinosaurs still exist, and are fully sapient. Adventure ensues.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1-f-TVvwgdT1LDcIVKUS1KGs7BU-d_1p_/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Turok: Dinosaur Hunter</a></div>
		</div>
	</div>
</div><br>


<div class="bbCodeSpoiler">
	<button type="button" class="bbCodeSpoiler-button button--longText button" data-xf-click="toggle" data-xf-init="tooltip" data-original-title="Click to reveal or hide spoiler" id="js-XFUniqueId282"><span class="button-text">

		<span>Spoiler: <span class="bbCodeSpoiler-button-title">Survival</span></span>
	</span></button>
	<div class="bbCodeSpoiler-content">
		<div class="bbCodeBlock bbCodeBlock--spoiler">
			<div class="bbCodeBlock-content">Settings where the struggle to live another day is the main focus. Instead of a single or few antagonists, threats are many, difficult and diverse.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1RtuCAsTQ6Vuy-1RAYaCrIVoBejIiHGIC/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Alien Vs. Predator</a> Some aliens hunt humans for sport, others as food for their young.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1EGHDuGQhZ6Bejc9z7zoLZ7_rprZynMMt/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Castaway</a> A FedEx employee survives a plane crash, washes up on a deserted island.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/18NppdAPspgeFW2y3HsrAoQcTzPfQPo7G/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Jurassic Park</a> dinosaurs are back, and eating people. <a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1zinhT8XzgLGzCTb7mv49xeSxLVQEwmOb/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Jurassic World Evolution.</a><br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1yCwRHyV8I-0z4_KRYiBgJ9hclnjhiQu4/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Surviving Mars</a> survival game.<br>
<br>
<u>Post-Apocalyptic:</u> Human civilization had a good run, but it's over now.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1__0YXuCTMc_rbPr7XHROcj_hUViGoJhl/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Generic Post-Apocalypse</a> fill in your own.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1tYzSEuccXG1G1g5hsWMXAwT3SgI6aomS/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">9</a> After the robots have wiped out all human/animal life, nine dolls journey to save the world.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1G5FKgCNPT2ijrR3UXvUE6mthqziVh0by/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Bastion</a> An apocalypse of floating islands.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1qGMT0toGwsst6zCzTGUU-IN7_lVNfl_N/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Fallout</a> <i>the</i> Post-Apocalyptic RPG. Decades after the bombs fell, you can help piece society back together - or burn it all down. (<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1OcRiP1JWleMyLtKYoCKV5YmAQEKXFEOl/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">1</a>, <a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1YnQ392KH97HRH-IpWTMCyxM7VDlfQIfs/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">2</a>, <a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1PL-aDBPnhA-3KS8yqjT-jiL44Ec6pkVK/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">New Vegas</a>, <a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1F7CwIXWZybexnpGOZYVSu4qZMcqWl5MH/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">4</a>, <a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1VvXfVtfJ3lDM5At79uVw3RHgjjNSinA-/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">76</a>, <a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1mccO2V2yvPo-636FIh_M7CmZaHWbhH9G/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Tactics</a>, <a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1cgn39-h84ww8ZMP9P8BxQdi1iCb6vD2r/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Mutants</a>, <a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1pvwqIrDXgXysyHNCc_bX258Uy9Nm8_mq/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Automatrons</a> and finally <a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/13sFK7ES-qG9GAfa6WbxjWOT1ZVrZ_ABh/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Modded.</a>)<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1MIUEOA0AlXP70bZBhXwMnqryC-yeMjUe/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Fifty Fathoms</a> post-apocalyptic pirate fantasy.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1rF5l0kBs61C552Hpjtdr-GmL5e3N6DxN/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">FreakAngels</a> psychic teens broke space-time and flooded London. Now as young adults they shepherd a community of survivors in Whitechapel.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1o6DtUeZ3o0PMqLXbqOi6idR0WOvOh6qD/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">I Have A Mansion in the Post-Apocalypse</a> A kid gets hold of a device that lets him shift back and forth between our world, and a far more advanced, but destroyed one.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1kP52aBK0OWUj7-2SsMMbokvSR2GGyw2y/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Hostile Waters</a> The old world was overthrown in 2012, a utopian society created in the last twenty years that has forgotten war, save one ship which must defend the world against reactionary forces.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1RZFNlEzWmnWMb5NqlBE2EqMlAOAbw3fj/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Hellgate London</a> Demons have overrun the old world. Mages, hunters and templars must work together to close the Well of Midnight through which dead demons rez, and wipe them all out.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1t4Lyj2aIIqrriPUFUU1k_U4hVncEVFvS/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Kipo &amp; the Age of Wonderbeasts</a> (<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Ie_OV0YwbP1YtjSIhY7ARZFP1d2eiOao/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Reddit version</a>) The world was overrun by mutants. Smart animals, huge animals... weird ones. What remains of humanity cowers in Burrows, until Kipo makes it to the surface world.<br>
Mad Max, most resources have run out, gangs increasingly run the world. <a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1bs9orNZF8LYH0IrkYsOpyhDR9aA-6hBR/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Gauntlet</a> and <a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1xg1dUnEEtn7XL8PCEOKxt3ZKMu_L6dez/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">video game.</a><br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1gWhs0BRE-o6AXc5ekHPeqFGQ-Eoxa4qM/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Metro 2033</a> After a nuclear war, all humanity seems to be 50K people huddling in the tunnels and shelters beneath Moscow. Corruption and division thrive, and then the mutants start invading.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1eljasCEUFxIHbaguHcAHnDeYGAu_lutB/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Reign of Fire</a> dragons come back.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1fZG6WZ-k39o2Xk1GhB3S1rlZNh7KLaI_/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Waterworld</a> Widely panned movie, the world is flooded but one hero has a map fragment for the last bits of dry land.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1-1db5GUPEPWI5SgM4QWcqHCY9khslt_y/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Ward</a> (<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/17ldbZ8m6Fp-QX0O3IIvQV1umg7xtja_p/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Joke Version</a>) Superpowers following a multiverse-spanning cosmic god apocalypse. Interdimensional war threatens, kaiju, killer robots getting frisky. It's a real peach.<br>
<br>
<u>Dystopian:</u> Society is trying to kill you.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1B78RI_8g8QLJW1wetKYi0Q4hQ0mC1AIN/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">the Bad Batch</a> a huge chunk of Texas desert is turned into an open-air prison where anarchy reigns.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1iAAV_rxxoqalrpf2Z6wBtci0BSczyqC2/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Generic Dystopia</a><br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1j_Y4ra3IeXToodv-n67dkF6zG1h_rOpk/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">1984</a> Britain is now Landing Strip One, part of Oceania, a surveillance state where life is lived under a microscope and any hint of dissent leads you to get vanished.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1sLLjDP-qusaEFAn88zIM5sSjL4POLo8t/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Cyperpunk 2077</a> wherein all society are nomads or in the hilarious dangerous Night City ruled by Megacorps and (and themselves indistinguishavble from) violent gangs. Plus <a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1GdAqgjRThw2pCxhXkhaTwlaNxcsDUX0X/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Reddit version</a> and <a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/14Eo3aElVKzx2O1GLg23aOg9FAW-qFU8M/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Edgerunners.</a><br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1rqsIsiTmLrOCl0DGHXc6zR6cMeGLsKP-/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Equilibrium</a> action movie. After the last world war, all art and music were forbidden and people take emotion-suppressing drugs to prevent the excesses which led to the war. Preston is a tetragrammaton cleric, responsible for hunting down 'sense-offenders' who becomes one himself.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1f7anjQcO627qXPS4zJDfXt0KGLYZxAHM/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">The Hunger Games</a> children are pitted against each other in deadly gladiatorial combat, while a luxurious Capitol fleeces the rest of Panem (post-apoc America).<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1190zrmjRZwD8jRvZnIAVBXXI4vE8wiZ_/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Judge Dredd</a> After the atomic wars, most of humanity has coalesced into the Mega-Cities, two for the US and others around the world. With a traditional justice system unable to cope with the scale of crime, street judges are empowered to perform summary executions.<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1bshxp-0yEm8xSenzYNhQVULPFGgIxvaP/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Liberal Crime Squad</a> A world of political extremism, on both sides.</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</div><br>


<div class="bbCodeSpoiler">
	<button type="button" class="bbCodeSpoiler-button button--longText button" data-xf-click="toggle" data-xf-init="tooltip" data-original-title="Click to reveal or hide spoiler" id="js-XFUniqueId283"><span class="button-text">

		<span>Spoiler: <span class="bbCodeSpoiler-button-title">Modern Adventure</span></span>
	</span></button>
	<div class="bbCodeSpoiler-content">
		<div class="bbCodeBlock bbCodeBlock--spoiler">
			<div class="bbCodeBlock-content">Modern or near-modern worlds. Supernatural elements can exist (Indiana Jones, Tomb Raider) but generally as something rare and highly special. Crime, police procedurals, action movies and spy thrillers should all go here.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1rJBChy_UO9oSqsDwNE4m1UGhuM7nOoFe/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Indiana Jones</a> adventuring archaeologist keeps treasures out of the hands of Nazis.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/178FfAzPFhVqyf_0T9bcA8tUQOTUe8Icj/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Kung Fury</a> Miami's best Kung Fu cop goes back in time to take in the Kung Fuhrer, Adolf Hitler.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1tg8WsGZIwZE2AzWPfdQv1UHgdzIw9Dnk/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">The Lost Empire</a> Two women cops and a thief infiltrate a cult to prevent an immortal sorcerer from finishing a doomsday weapon.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1GY7FlhgD2Va3rOEoNNRqByN1INiUnzp_/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Nina Wilde &amp; Eddie Chase</a> Two steamy lovers pursue the world's lost treasures.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1dSqaQgYMYLCzOdUKQcvT1oXAiPIDtdCR/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Problem Sleuth</a> You are trapped in a puzzle box and must retrieve a megaton key from a mob boss to get back to the real world/next Jump.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1-7Vav-8YqwM1aTZQRHDLOoEIHF8r8bKt/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Tomb Raider</a> Games. Archaeologist Laura Croft wanders the world.<br>
<br>
<u>Generics:</u><br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1gy6KKZs3QzqjRuR8ASLUYOrv-iROnI5e/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Modern Action Movies</a><br>
<br>
<br>
<u>Crime/Police/Legal Drama:</u><br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1RdryT6IpyrA9xxCnUMBW-6He4J5Qq4Zy/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Generic Police</a><br>
<br>

About a cop whose a smooth cat and knows kung fu, uncovering a massive plot to emasculate black men.<br>

		<span>Spoiler: <span class="bbCodeSpoiler-button-title">Military Jumps</span></span>
	</span></button>
	<div class="bbCodeSpoiler-content">
		<div class="bbCodeBlock bbCodeBlock--spoiler">
			<div class="bbCodeBlock-content">Jumps where you will, or most likely will, serve in a military. Conflict being a part of so many stories, there's countless war stories to be found here.<br>
<br>
<u>Generic:</u><br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1M2Dj_WKx4sEjLej9Upn1P52eKzPl5vV1/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Age of Sail</a><br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ewaTlqAXGry__VzA5vRZ4EOeI02KALEJ/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Generic HFY</a> Prove human superiority to elves, aliens, etc.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1tEblrn5zxqepiCUb-UXJLm_FfjASWLeo/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Generic Military</a><br>
<br>
<u>Historical/Psuedohistorical War:</u><br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/12agOhI1kZq2E0zySISbihRRdk5MdTTy-/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Mount &amp; Blade</a> Lead a mercenary company in medieval Calradia, maybe all the way to a throne.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1GGUde0Lbw6s9wQCLH4yB8EUjETA32m0o/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Spartan: Total Warrior</a> Be a footsoldier in the Pyrrhic War (Roman conquest of Greece, 280-275 BCE). In a videogame where the protagonist eventually drives the Romans off which is, ah, not how things went down, historically.<br>
<br>
<u>Modern:</u><br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1yZUZW8iTc17WXoRrh6O08BnXfM8Rs-I0/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Ace Combat</a> rule the skies, shoot down ridiculous superweapons in your high tech jet fighter.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Op7zZgZrbbPqzVBVvQQxj1PAc_Akm0jO/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Generation Kill</a> a reporter is seconded to a squad during the Second Gulf War.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1WEqflUfflWLMQl2hGrlVvBremQnwC8V4/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">G.I. Joe</a> a real American hero battles the terrorists of Cobra.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1uazOxDpouAmPA-Jph1FvOCeU4v7KMKII/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">MASH</a> Mobile Army Surgical Hospital. Military doctors get up to wacky antics in the Korean War (1950-53).<br>
<br>
<u>Space/Sci-fi:</u><br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1bQhIQSUxhh6MB8xH2cDOmHVwgpQ4tQKV/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Halo</a> Humans are attacked by religious aliens, <a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1SYPZ4trSksT-KEW6ajFtLK32uFCUkgF2/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">the Covenant</a> who hope to follow their gods, the <a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Sa0YiTsiRqbtEejVoMKTdyqPgxRjQrnz/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Forerunners</a> to paradise using the titular devices - which actually kill everyone in galaxy to contain a sapient super-plague, the Flood.<br>
- <a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B1qb0_OLhDrDM195MXpodEMtTkk/view?resourcekey=0-tBDrs9D9GCwn03pKrIuhWw" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Gauntlet</a>.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1RWLrg8ZoRJx22zEcPokuZYFYgsASqg7l/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Honor Harrington</a> Horatio Hornblower in Space, where Space!Britain is besieged by Space!France at the bidding of shadowy slaving puppetmasters. <a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1WAOC_Xanc-jn4ay-BPLDd9Fq-VnkHQd1/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Honorverse.</a><br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1MNr_o8k2cqYzf0g18sEmKVsMHFNUautM/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Killzone</a> War between the space UN and the rebellious colony of Helghan.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1iiFE1vSGLwYWop7t78bYuyQQlvLZWrAV/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Legend of the Galactic Heroes</a> big set-piece space battles anime series.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1CHq7NMJDfB0CM6S_kbUkNVCdDQc1jMqk/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">The Lost Fleet</a> After a century in stasis, following the opening battle of a war, Black Jack Geary is astonished to find the war is ongoing, and every officer left is a suicidal gloryhound with the tactical sense of a pack of lemmings. He pulls a small surviving force from a failed assault and they start a running battle home.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1U-8z-AMn1nWBULdpdIphWVqANo7KfWyl/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Project Wingman</a> fighter aces fight for a rare element centuries after a Ring of Fire mass eruption/nuclear winter.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ghGHA7ee4VnEsLD0AdKVWoIDsB3ifMPo/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Supreme Commander</a> join a thousand year war where one mecha/factory is teleported to a world and has covered it in tanks within hours. (<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ygNlB8U8f4s6os19Y6-7REyyfHVzVHL-/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">TG</a>) and <a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1umBbBFFp7-bW8WBEB1dKrMZtJ4J6RvG7/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">SupCom 2.</a><br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1qrmiuGs0AjVDuUhmcm5dLV52CxH7K3ot/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Tiny Tank</a> robot revolution<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Pgbe5LQeXRMZzrojVx9q2ExQhy_XeBj8/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Xenonauts</a> 1970s governments versus alien invaders.<br>
<br>
<u>Weird/Fantastical:</u><br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1DvNJrh1YwWaSwYlixjqs7Gqpl6gvPfhl/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Army Men</a> toy soldiers find a portal to an abandoned world of giants, scavenge supplies to win the war.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ssGG3GPX6twZGKdZHdZf2pS2clYoqZ3h/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Legion of Liberty</a> American Revolution plus superheroes.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/17qUPKMyz464Dt8oKHqTFMWTKfINPBRpf/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Phoenix Point</a> XCOM-lite, after an eldritch disease and monsters have taken over the world and killed off most of humanity, fight to save whatever is left.<br>

<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ZdhCl4ClpDK-DgH2DH8dK4JlQdxH1yIa/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Strike Witches</a> Flying witches versus alien invaders.</div>

		<span>Spoiler: <span class="bbCodeSpoiler-button-title">Horror</span></span>
	</span></button>
	<div class="bbCodeSpoiler-content">
		<div class="bbCodeBlock bbCodeBlock--spoiler">

<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1QI_LCUkF6waFx5T1seJst-HAWKIy_WXE/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Alan Wake</a> tortured writer's demons become more literal than usual.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1OvBmrvD9CF3CDOOQ3VD3uTIfYrVBGmZY/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">The Crow</a> one man returns from the dead as a revenant.<br>

<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1QpQIqP70odyWLtUMlYnMNrn2szunilR4/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Stranger Things</a> Government experiments on psychic children unleash extradimensional monsters on a small town.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Jz1doV3vYOCrmMEeAqEndYL3JSdx8y_4/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">Twilight</a> Clueless girl romances a vampire and a werewolf.<br>
<br>
<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1EetPnZ25rx5aX3hhzS9NqfzsqL4Wi-dh/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">The Witches of Eastwick</a> Three women summon their perfect man, the devil.<br>

<a href="https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Oh-CDyQYiT2Njc-hAvCUq4S29Rh4_kkQ/view" target="_blank" class="link link--external" rel="nofollow ugc noopener">The World's Shortest Horror Story</a> "The last man on earth sat alone in a room, he heard a knock on the door"<br>
